title: panic on mapassign: overflow is not nil
body:
fatal error: overflow is not nil
    
    goroutine 18 [running]:
    runtime.throw(0x88c070, 0x13)
        /home/matthew/src/golang/go1.5.1/src/runtime/panic.go:527 +0x90 fp=0xc8209d7558 sp=0xc8209d7540
    runtime.hashGrow(0x6fd760, 0xc82137fe90)
        /home/matthew/src/golang/go1.5.1/src/runtime/hashmap.go:776 +0x132 fp=0xc8209d7588 sp=0xc8209d7558
    runtime.mapassign1(0x6fd760, 0xc82137fe90, 0xc8209d7684, 0xc8209d7668)
        /home/matthew/src/golang/go1.5.1/src/runtime/hashmap.go:481 +0x55b fp=0xc8209d7630 sp=0xc8209d7588

Server was busy, but I've run this test before many times and this is the first time I've seen this. Please let me know if there's anything in particular you'd like me to investigate.
